name: STEAM MAZEHEM
description:
Hello and welcome to STEAM MAZEHEM, a game where you find yourself in a labyrinth that you can actually move! 

- - -

You are Sinrie, a steam technician tasked to maintain your mayor's eccentric house when, suddenly, you find yourself locked in a twisted maze! Her Prototype House Order Neuroliser can move different rooms of the maze as it were a slide puzzle, but she must be aware of the numerous perils that may await in every corner!

Slide rooms, fight enemies and run to the exit... if you can find it!

You can download the latest executable build in the download link, or if you want to see the ins and outs of the game (while we continue updating it) you can download and see the source code, sprites and all the lot through the Unity Editor here!

IN-HOUSE
